prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with an event chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: #

Since this chart is drawn up for a specific past event, Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant in this chart, and I should be represented by his 9th house (foreign connection).

Due to the lack of planets in the 1st house, Stefan should be represented by Jupiter, the first house ruler, and I should be represented by Mercury, the ruler of the 9th house.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the chart using event chart principles (I believe they are similar to horary principles). Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a structured list of the relevant chart data for this event‐chart interpretation using event/horary principles. In this chart Stefan is represented by the Ascendant (ruler: Jupiter in Gemini in the 6th house) and you (Melissa) by the 9th house (ruler: Mercury in Aquarius in the 2nd house). The following items are the key data points:

1. Chart Structure and House Placements
 • 1st House (Stefan’s representative): Begins at 27° Sagittarius (no planets present; its ruler Jupiter is found in the 6th house in Gemini at 11° 21′)
 • 9th House (Melissa’s representative through foreign connection): Begins at 23° Virgo (ruler Mercury in Aquarius at 23° 54′, located in the 2nd house)
 • MC (10th House cusp) at 27° Libra
 • IC (4th House cusp) at 27° Aries

2. Planetary Positions (as provided)
 • Sun: 22° 39′ Aquarius
 • Moon: 5° 42′ Leo (waxing gibbous)
 • Mercury: 23° 54′ Aquarius (ruler of the 9th house)
 • Venus: 4° 35′ Aries
 • Mars: 18° 5′ Cancer (retrograde)
 • Jupiter: 11° 21′ Gemini (ruler of Sagittarius, representing Stefan)
 • Saturn: 18° 33′ Pisces
 • Uranus: 23° 19′ Taurus
 • Neptune: 28° 16′ Pisces (in its rulership)
 • Pluto: 2° 22′ Aquarius
 • North Node: 29° 19′ Pisces (retrograde)
 • Chiron: 19° 50′ Aries

3. Major Aspects (with key orbs noted; these include aspects with tight or zero orb as well as those centering on sensitive points for Stefan and Melissa)
 • Ascendant Sextile MC (orb 0°)
 • Sun Conjunction Mercury (orb 1°) – emphasizes communication and mental clarity
 • Mercury Square Uranus (orb 0°) – may indicate sudden or unexpected insights or disruptions affecting the 9th-house matters
 • Mercury Sextile Ascendant (orb 4°) and Mercury Sextile IC (orb 4°) – indicates supportive flow between personal expression and foundational matters
 • Mercury Trine MC (orb 4°) – enhances public projection or external reception
 • Moon Sextile Jupiter (orb 6°) – supports optimism and growth regarding Stefan’s representation
 • Neptune Square Ascendant (orb 1°) – introduces an element of ambiguity around personal identity or perception
 • Sun Square Uranus (orb 1°) – suggests sudden breaks or surprises, affecting the individual’s self-expression
 • Venus Sextile Pluto (orb 2°) – indicates intensity in emotional or relational dynamics
 • North Node Square Ascendant (orb 2°) and Pluto Sextile North Node (orb 3°) – point to fate-related turning points concerning personal relationships
 • Additional aspects involving Chiron (e.g., Sun Sextile Chiron (orb 3°) and Mercury Sextile Chiron (orb 4°)) bring in themes of healing and vulnerability

Other notable aspects from the provided list include:
 • MC Opposition IC (orb 0°) and Ascendant Trine IC (orb 0°) – these solid structural markers inform overall balance
 • Uranus Sextile Neptune (orb 5°), Saturn Sextile Uranus (orb 5°), and Mars Sextile Uranus (orb 5°) – these aspects factor in the dynamic between conventional limitations and sudden change

4. Chart Patterns
 • T-Square: Involving MC in 27° Libra, Pluto in 2° Aquarius, and IC in 27° Aries
 • Multiple Planet Square: Involving North Node in 29° Pisces, Ascendant in 27° Sagittarius, Neptune in 28° Pisces, and Venus in 4° Aries
 • Cradle: Involving Chiron in 19° Aries, MC in 27° Libra, Ascendant in 27° Sagittarius, Mercury in 23° Aquarius, Sun in 22° Aquarius, and IC in 27° Aries

5. Special Features and Dominant Energies
 • Dominant Air element among the inner planets (Sun, Mercury, Pluto)
 • Absence of Earth-sign placements for the inner planets
 • Emphasis on the lower right quadrant
 • Top left quadrant remains empty, suggesting minimal focus on detached, abstract cerebral approaches
 • Chiron and the IC are positioned on the Nadir—highlighting themes of vulnerability, healing, and foundational issues
 • The Sextile is highly frequent (13 times), reinforcing a generally supportive flow between many points
 • Neptune in Pisces, being in its own sign, brings added spiritual or elusive overtones

6. Additional Considerations for Event Chart Readings
 • Stefan’s decision point and future contact timing will be evaluated by examining the condition and aspects of Jupiter (as the 1st-house representative) and its interplay with the Ascendant.
 • Melissa’s potential influence is measured through Mercury (ruler of the 9th house) and its aspects, particularly those involving the Ascendant and MC, which reflect external actions and communications.
 • Tight aspects (orb 0°–1°) such as Mercury Square Uranus, Sun Conjunction Mercury, and Sun Square Uranus emphasize that sudden insights or disruptions may be at work during the event.
 • The involvement of fate markers (North Node aspects and Pluto dynamics) indicates that transformative change might be a critical factor in the decision-making process.

This is the complete list of the foundational chart data relevant for your question regarding Stefan’s decision point and the timing of his contact, as represented by the event chart.

6. Additional Considerations for Event Chart Readings
 • Stefan’s decision point and future contact timing will be evaluated by examining the condition and aspects of Jupiter (as the 1st-house representative) and its interplay with the Ascendant.
 • Melissa’s potential influence is measured through Mercury (ruler of the 9th house) and its aspects, particularly those involving the Ascendant and MC, which reflect external actions and communications.
 • Tight aspects (orb 0°–1°) such as Mercury Square Uranus, Sun Conjunction Mercury, and Sun Square Uranus emphasize that sudden insights or disruptions may be at work during the event.
 • The involvement of fate markers (North Node aspects and Pluto dynamics) indicates that transformative change might be a critical factor in the decision-making process.

This is the complete list of the foundational chart data relevant for your question regarding Stefan’s decision point and the timing of his contact, as represented by the event chart.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
The chart’s energy reveals that decision is mounting in Stefan’s realm. His personification—the Ascendant, ruled by Jupiter in Gemini placed in the 6th house—signals his daily routines and work-life matters influencing his mindset. Jupiter’s aspects, particularly the supportive Moon sextile Jupiter, indicate an emotional openness that may lend weight to sudden recognition of a need for contact.

Mercury—the ruler of your 9th house, placed in Aquarius in the 2nd house—carries its own disruptive influence, emphasized by the tight square to Uranus. This points to unexpected, perhaps abrupt events pushing you both into a decisive moment. The Sun’s conjunction with Mercury (a mere 1° orb) merges identities and intentions, yet the Sun’s square to Uranus warns of a break in routine, one that can trigger unforeseen communication.

The T-square configuration involving the MC in Libra, Pluto in Aquarius, and the IC in Aries nudges the overall dynamic into a transformative, fated arena. North Node and Pluto aspects whisper that—despite routine hesitations—destiny is steering matters toward resolution. The multiplicity of sextile aspects throughout the chart adds an undercurrent of gentle facilitation amid the tension.

The combination of these forces suggests that a sudden flash of insight, spurred by Mercury square Uranus amid daily activities (6th house matters), will prompt Stefan to make a decisive move. Timing-wise, the energy is active now; the balance of stability and surprise indicates that contact could be initiated within days rather than drawn-out deliberation. In essence, the chart leans toward a swift breakthrough, potentially manifesting as a brief yet clear message.

The interpretation implies Stefan is on the verge of his decision point, his internal and external factors aligning to favor unexpected communication. Expect his contact, reflective of that mercurial, unanticipated spark, in the coming week.
